bibl.title: On the Architectural Decoration and Dating of the Church of Dayr Anbā Bīšūy ("Red Monastery") near Sūhāǧ in Upper Egypt.
bibl.note: Introduction. - A. The Architecural Decoration. - B. Interpretation of the Architecural Decoration. - C. Triconch and Total Structure: Construction Phases or Allocations? - D. The Dating of the Church. [Middle third of the sixth century.]
bibl.seg: SEVERIN Hans-Georg, On the Architectural Decoration and Dating of the Church of Dayr Anbā Bīšūy ("Red Monastery") near Sūhāǧ in Upper Egypt.

Introduction. - A. The Architecural Decoration. - B. Interpretation of the Architecural Decoration. - C. Triconch and Total Structure: Construction Phases or Allocations? - D. The Dating of the Church. [Middle third of the sixth century.]
